title: Is there any proof that Bob Dylan actually 'sold out'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sold out? Him, who run all the risks and lost his public when he abandoned his acoustic folk style for electric guitars and band right in the middle of his peak of fame? I’ll post again a video of part of his 60 Minutes’ interview where he explains his early poetry talent and subsequent creation. It's in this answer of mine. Julie Swiss's answer to How do I write songs like Bob Dylan?

When Dylan allowed one of his songs to be used in a Victoria’s Secret commercial, I was disturbed and concerned. Based on his life and music, though, he certainly appreciates beautiful women. But he has remained true to himself in both his writing and performances and that keeps him authentic and relevant.
